SYSTEM: Wiki: https://delicias.dia.fi.upm.es/wiki/index.php/Hoteles_en_Luxemburgo 

City Hotel
Coin Av. de la Liberté
1 Rue de Strasbourg BP 2126
L-1021 LUXEMBOURG
www.cityhotel.lu
NOTE: near the train station; rooms can be loud; WLAN free but slow
Novotel Kirchberg
6 rue Fort Niedergrünewald
Quartier Européen Nord
Plateau de Kirchberg
L-2226 LUXEMBOURG
www.novotel.com/de/hotel-1930-novotel-luxembourg-kirchberg/index.shtml
NOTE: closer to the airport than to the city center and the EC; spacious rooms, free and fast WLAN in rooms
Melia Luxembourg
1 Park Drai Echelen
10 Rue Fort Thuengen
L-1499 LUXEMBOURG
www.melia-luxembourg.com/en/melia-luxemburgo.html
Novotel Center
35 RUE DU LABORATOIRE
L-1911 LUXEMBOURG
www.novotel.com/gb/hotel-5556-novotel-luxembourg-centre/index.shtml
